conference.title: ScotlandPHP 2016
conference.summary: Introducing Scotland's first and best PHP conference. ScotlandPHP is a one-day conference, being held on Saturday October 29th 2016 in our nation's capital, Edinburgh. The conference venue is the super-awesome [Dynamic Earth](https://conference.scotlandphp.co.uk/venue/), in the spectacular surroundings of Holyrood Park and Edinburgh's historic Old Town.
conference.content:
Introducing Scotland's first and best PHP conference. ScotlandPHP is a one-day conference, being held on Saturday October 29th 2016 in our nation's capital, Edinburgh. The conference venue is the super-awesome [Dynamic Earth](https://conference.scotlandphp.co.uk/venue/), in the spectacular surroundings of Holyrood Park and Edinburgh's historic Old Town.
There will be two tracks across the day, packed with [the best speakers around](https://conference.scotlandphp.co.uk/speakers/) and bookended by keynotes from world class speakers: Anthony Ferrara and Jessica Rose.
Visit the [ScotlandPHP Conference website](https://conference.scotlandphp.co.uk/) for further details and to purchase tickets.
